game.name: Saints Row: The Third - Horror Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Join the ranks of the most terrifying dreams with these horrific costumes. The flesh-eating Zombie Outfit will have everyone you meet running for their lives. Even more horrifying is the Slasher Outfit--it's all of your worst nightmares rolled into one.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join the ranks of the most terrifying dreams with these horrific costumes. The flesh-eating Zombie Outfit will have everyone you meet running for their lives. Even more horrifying is the Slasher Outfit--it's all of your worst nightmares rolled into one.
